text: Gian Carlo Muzzarelli (born 22 June 1955 in Modena) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he served as President of the Province of Modena from 2014 to 2018. He was elected Mayor of Modena on 8 June 2014 and took his office on 10 June. He has been re-elected for a second term in 2019. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *2019 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Modena ==External links== * * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Modena Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians Category:Presidents of the Province of Modena
title: Gian Carlo Muzzarelli
